about_the_game:
Description

Welcome to the world of high-stakes arcade racing with a twist! In our game, winning isn't just about crossing the finish line, it's about claiming your rival's antigravity-powered racing machines. Dive into a rich world of factions, each with its own style and controls, and push your skills to the limit with our intricate anti-gravity physics. Start your engines and prepare for a racing experience like no other!

Features

  • Engage in online multiplayer mode, where you can compete against players from around the world, offering a challenging and dynamic gaming experience.

  • Dive into the single-player campaign, accomplishing tasks to earn rewards. Keep in mind that while solo play offers its own rewards, the true competition lies in the multiplayer arena.

  • Explore the game's factions, with each of the 3 unique groups presenting a distinctive approach to driving in their respective hovercars. Discover the diverse strategies and styles associated with each faction.

  • Experience the nuanced physics of the game, where each hovercar boasts individual dynamic parameters such as weight, speed, and driving style. This allows players to find a hovercar that aligns with their preferences and playstyle.

Factions

The game includes three factions: Retro, Eurasia, and Pan America. Each faction offers a distinct lineup of hovercars, each with its own set of strengths and weaknesses that players must master. Unique tracks set in different biomes are assigned to each faction, creating a competitive environment as they vie for the title of the top car concern. Players develop individual reputations with each faction based on their performance in races, influencing their ability to purchase more advanced and costly hovercars from the respective factions.

Biome variety

The game will showcase five distinct biomes characterized by varying surfaces and track difficulties. These biomes not only contribute to the visual aesthetics but also significantly impact gameplay. Factors such as hovercar control and the rewards earned after each race are influenced by the biome, as each track is affiliated with one of the three factions.

Speed and handling

Project Hover incorporates intricate physics, with each hovercar possessing unique characteristics that require time and skill to master. The game's high-speed hovercraft can reach speeds exceeding 1000 km per hour across a diverse range of tracks, featuring surfaces ranging from roads to water and snow. These varying terrains not only visually impact the gameplay but also pose a significant challenge, as any misstep can prove fatal, potentially resulting in the loss of your hovercar

High stakes

Take hover mod is the main mode of online racing in the game. In this mode, players get the biggest cash reward and ranking boost in the game. And the most interesting thing is that the first three winners of the race take away one hover of their choice from the players who lost.

Discord community

Join our official game developers' Discord! Engage in conversations with fellow players, stay updated on the latest game development news, participate in surveys, and have a direct impact on the game's evolution. Together, let's collaboratively shape a groundbreaking racing game that will revolutionize the genre!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100 or Intel Core I3 7100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 or Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720P 30FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700 or Core I7 10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5700 or Nvidia RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080P 60FPS

short_description: Antigravity racing game with multiplayer and single-player. Each player can either lose his hover or take over the hover of another player in online full loot PvP mode.
